service.visible: a new section appears on the My Accounts page
service.name: Fax Support w Custom Barcoding
service.comment: There are no prerequisites for this module
service.explanation: Allows you to send and receive faxes from your MedCommons Account
service.technical: Incoming faxes always arrive into MedCommons if a cover sheet with barcode leads back to a patient's account. If the account has not been setup, the account holder will be prompted to turn this feature on. Once enabled, the accumulated messages can be seen in a MedCommons maintained Fax Inbox.
